User Psychology Flow:
1. See inviting headline \(not command\)
2. Understand safety \(anonymous + auto-delete\)
3. Choose sorting easily \(tabs, not dropdown\)
4. See activity status \(real-time feel\)
5. Click confidently \(clear visual feedback\)

Launch Risk Mitigation:
- Empty state no longer looks abandoned
- Active users badge creates social proof
- Simplified sorting reduces decision paralysis
- Core values visible without scrolling

Mobile-First:
- Thumb-friendly tabs instead of dropdown
- Single-hand operation optimized
- Reduced cognitive load
- Faster decision making
